dimension: 27 11/16 x 26 1/8 in. (70.33 x 66.36 cm) (at waistband, without ties or fringe)
title: Festival apron
description: black sides and waistband; dark blue, tan and white woven ties; center panel of dark blue and purple embroidered with black swastika motifs highlighted in pink, cream and green, and horizontal linear, swastika and repeating geometric patterns at bottom; short fringe on embroidered panel bottom
creditline: Given in memory of Lynn Swanson
